values:
Well, here we are, another Christmas over and now my attention turns to tonight.

Me and Sally are meeting up with alot of our friends in town for a big night out on the tiles.
Thing is, round here (and I don't know if this is the same anywhere else) Boxing night is traditionally fancy dress night.
Pretty much everyone who ventures out tonight will be in fancy dress (except my bro cos hes a party pooper LOL).

So, what should I go as?????

A pair of Speedos and some goggles - hey presto, Duncan Goodhew LOL

Not really, I've been told that if I went as anyone but Papa Lazarou it just would not be right.

So, off to get drunk in my mischief costume......

How much fun can you have when you're in disguise???

The answer is one hell of alot !!!!

Heres the full list of all of us so far :
Papa Lazarou, policeman, schoolgirl, schoolboy, drag queen, fallen angel, cave girl plus many more to be confirmed !!!!!!!

Should be another great night but I'm not looking forward to it too much in case I over hype it in my mind and then have one of those let-down experiences when you build something up in your mind too much.

Anyways - gotta go, it appears from the smell that dejeuner is nearly ready.

You Are a Perfect Lay!

All sorts of girls long to hook up with you, but your standards are set high.
You don't just give it up to anyone, but when you do...they can't get enough of you!
You have a knack for pleasing and receiving, and sex with you is never boring.
Only problem is ~ they all seem to be falling in love with you...

What Kind of Lay Are You?
More Great Quizzes from Quiz Diva

Well, not had chance to get on here last few days....

Been having a hell of alot of fun with my mate Sally which is great.
We've started getting along really well again and we're having such a cool time I've got a permanent smile on my face.
Same old stuff done - gigs, clubs, dancing like a loon, going out in wigs etc etc - nothing out of the ordinary !!!!

Anyways, two days of employment left and then I think that there will be alot more frequent updates on here LOL

So, the day when I finish work rapidly approaches - just two weeks left now.
I really don't know what I'm gonna do when its time to finally leave but as long as I can have some fun I'm not really concerned.
I'm sure something will come up......

Just sat in my room, pretty bored waiting to start work at twelve.
Hoping someone will appear on msn soon cos the wiganmusic message board is far too quiet at the moment.
Ah well, think I'll pop off for a brew and hope that theres something exciting to do when I get back :)

So, once again I'm sat in my room with a little too much time on my hands wondering what the purpose of it all is.....
I've been having a difficult time recently (well, I say recently but who am i trying to kid - I always have a difficult time!!)
Trouble is, the reason things are so hard for me at the moment is because I just don't listen to whats being said to me, instead choosing to believe my own version of events.
My life seems to revolve around me getting things totally wrong, and it appears that that is never going to change.
I can be such an arse when i want to be but I was really trying hard not to get like this again but unfortunately my vicious tongue reared its ugly head once more.
Why is it that i find it so easy to be truly horrible to people who i think the world of?
Is it like that for everyone or is it just me ?
Anyways, had a lot too much to drink last night but luckily managed not to be offensive to anyone.
Trouble is, Aftershock was involved which is always a recipe for disaster where I'm concerned. It only takes a couple of shots when I'm drunk to start me crying for some bizarre reason and seeing as how i thought (in my infinite wisdom) that having ten was a great idea you can begin to imagine how much i cried !!!!
Luckily I managed to save it until I got in, well luckily for saving my embarrasment today that is - but not so lucky for my best mate who (once again) had to endure a severe mood swing courtesy of yours truly.....
You'd think I'd learn really, but unfortunately the only thing I've learnt is that i never learn !!!!
Anyways, off i go in search of an adventure for the evening....

You are wind. You provide those you love with a
cool, gentle breeze when their face is hot with
tears. But if people that aren't your type
are around you for too long, they become
windburned. When you are very angry, you have
the power to blow others away. (Perhaps in a
cyclone, if you're up to it.) You're a free
spirit. You don't like it when you are set
with boundaries. DATING TIP: Earth is not good
for you. It breaks you up. Try air. You
mingle well together, and air depends on you to
move freely.

Well, only three and a bit weeks left at work now. I'm really looking forward to when it finishes although I still don't know what I'm going to do......

Last night was the first meeting to discuss the bid for funding that we (the Wigan Music Collective) are going to put in for next years Haigh Festival.
Last year was such a success but the lady from the Leisure Trust who managed the co-ordination of events last year isn't able to do it due to other commitments so theres a vacant role of Project Manager to be filled.
Without someone in this role the festival might only go ahead as a music festival instead of under the "Arts in the Park" banner.
Thing is that would suit us just fine seeing as all everyone comes to the festival for is the music and we know how to organise all of the music side of things. They're just worried that they may not be able to organise all of the other events that they had on last year but to be honest I didn't even see anything except the bands last year so it would be no great loss to us....
One of my mates is in the process of seeing if work will let him have more time off so that he can fill the role but in the meantime it seems we're not sure exactly what form the festival will take.
Next meeting in 3 weeks and no doubt nothing will have been sorted by then.

On a totally different note, I'm happy to say that I'm still in love with the same girl although I've made it ever so complicated for us both by causing arguments between us when I really should learn to keep my big mouth shut. I only try to let her know how I feel but it always ends up coming out all wrong and culminates with an argument. Well - not always, sometimes she likes me being nice to her LOL
Anyways - waffle waffle etc etc 

Enough from me for now :D

Well, the strangest thing happened this weekend...
Completely out of the blue, one of my mates told me that his mum and dad are opening a bar ib the South of France in March and that theres a job for me there if I want it.

I've always wanted to live in France and seeing as I've just quit my job and don't really have many ties to keep me here this seems like the ideal opportunity.
I'm still thinking about it because obviously I won't be able to see my kids as often as I do now.
Theres someone else who I'd miss a great deal too if I went.....

This could be the change I've been looking for, but then again it could be the thing that makes me realise just how much I do actually have to keep me here.
Ah well, a couple of months to mull it over anyway......

Wahey !!
Holiday from work this week and I really need to find something to do with myself......
I think I'll go inot town in a little while or theres a danger that I'll just stay here all day posting inane bollocks LOL
Got a few bills to pay and then the rest of the week is free to do as I please.
Wednesday is going to be a trip into manchester to watch The V.C's ( http://www.thevcs.com ) and that should be another fantastic gig. The band play kinda alternative surf rock, and they use a theremin to fantastic effect.
Anyways, off I pop.

Well, here's the picture of me in front of my mates band (excuse the cheesy metal pose LOL) Had a good laugh but the club was a bit boring as most people left when the bands had finished. Maybe we need to find somewhere different to go because I think its too much going to the same place all the time.....

Might go out in fancy dress again tonite by way of celebrating the fact that I've quit my shitty job.
Not sure whether to or not but I'm pretty sure that by the time I'm ready for going that I'll be made up and ready for action LOL

I'm off to The Lux Club to watch my mates band play.
http://www.gunpowderplot.org
Check their site out, they're a punk band and my mate Rob (pictured below) is on vocals/guitar

Well, I did it ! Handed my notice in at the review yesterday and I must say I feel very good for having done it.
My last day of work is 16 December and then I think I'll take Christmas off and get myself a new job in January...

WOOOOHOOOO !!!!! :D

Well folks, today is the moment of truth - have i got the bottle to quit my job of the last eight years and completely start again from scratch??????

I have a financial review at 12pm today and I've already written my notice out ready. Not because my review will be bad but just because I've really had enough of this line of work and I'm ready for change......
Six weeks notice and then I can take time off for Christmas and then get a new job for the new year.

I'm feeling so much happier at the thought of leaving that i think it has to be done.

Also, I'm not sure why, but i feel alot happier in general. I know really that its down to what one person has done for my confidence even though she doesn't realise it.
I've been thinking about it over the past couple of days because she asked me what she does that makes me think so much of her, and apart from the fact that shes funny, intelligent, gorgeous and the best company in the world, I sussed what it is.
I've realised that if someone so great can care so much about me then maybe I'm not that bad after all.
It's funny how moods change but at the moment I really do feel fantastic and I'm doing everything I can to make sure my mate feels great too - after all, its because of her that I feel good about myself and actually feel that I have the strength to leave this shitty job...
Me and my mate Rob at the Tudor House Hotel in Wigan

Had a mad moment of pure genial inspiration on Friday afternoon and decided to get dressed up as Papa Lazarou for the night out. Funny as fook that no-one recognised me until I told them who i was but then not surprising really seeing as I had my face completely made up and a wig on is it.... Anyways, for those of you who don't know who he is - here's a piccy of him. I can honestly say I've never been as popular in my life - maybe the way forward is to black my ugly face out every week and then people will talk to me....

Well, I'm back. 
Not really been getting online over the last few weeks cos I've not been staying at home. The thing is I fell inlove with this beautiful girl and I've spent all of my spare time with her.
Of course, it being my life, she doesn't feel the same way about me. I got it so wrong. I really thought that she really loved me and the way she acted said that she did but it turns out that she just loves to spend time with me but doesn't love me enough to be with me.
I'm incredibly down about the entire thing and I'm finding it very hard without seeing her but its the only way I can deal with it.
I did promise her that we'd be friends forever and I won't break that promise because promises mean alot to me. At the moment though its breaking my heart to be with her because even though we have so much fun together I just keep thinking how it would be if we were together.
I anticipate alot of writing about it on here to try and sort it all out in my head cos I really find it hard to talk to my friends about it without breaking down.
I'd love to be able to end this with a comment about how something else is going great in my life to compensate for the fact that I got this so wrong but unfortunately everything is shit at the moment.
Ah well, things will start to look up soon I'm sure.
I don't care what she says, for the last twelve weeks she's been my girlfriend despite the fact that she said she wasn't. And the last twelve weeks have been some of the happiest of my life but then I had to go and ruin it with my constant pressuring.
I miss her terribly but I'll get over it. I just hope that she's happy now, but I know she'll be missing me too.

Not sure what to do tonight... 
should I stay (in) or should I go (out) ?????
I think I shall go and have a shower while I decide and then more than likely I'll end up going out...... although maybe I should go out in the car and not touch the demon drink this evening....

Ahhh the dilemma of choice.
Why is it I find it so difficult to make my mind up about things that I can have a decision on but yet so easy to make choices that could affect me forever yet which aren't really affected by the decision I make on the subject....
Just read that back and I have little doubt that it probably makes no sense to anyone else - but most importantly I know what it means :P

Been fairly bored today - spent the day at work for twelve hours and most of that was spent by smoking, drinking coffee and bitching about people. What a way to spend the day....

Missed my mate today - you know you've got it bad when you can't even go a full day without wanting to see someone.... I really shouldn't feel this way about her but I just don't seem to be able to stop myself.
After all, she's the most beautiful person i've ever had the good fortune to meet.
I hope one day this all works out fairy tale style and we both live happily ever after - what a romantic fool i am !!!!

Ah well, might post something else in a bit, but I'm gonna go have a brew and a think then come back to the net in a while.....

Well, I have to apologise for the fact that I haven't updated this thing for quite some time now.
Basically my life has been revolving around two things.... 1. I met the most wonderful girl I have ever met and I spend alot of time with her and 2. alcohol....

Terrible I know, but the last few weeks have passed in a drunken haze. I'm getting myself back on track now though - I had some issues that I needed to sort out in my head and although my friend may not realise it she's helped me through a very bad time just by being there for me.

Anyways, I will get back to posting comedy nonsense in a couple of days or so...... oh and I will be perusing the journals of my friends and passing some comments when I get round to it.
Hehehe - its good to be back.......

Well, it turns out that the lads parents weren't away - they'd helped to organise the whole thing !!!!

What a day it was too, free food, free drink, some excellent live acts and a special someone keeping me company ;)

I took my kids down in the afternoon and we had a lot of fun.... they were really good and we just spent the afternoon acting daft and messing about whilst the bands were on.

Unfortunately I missed my mates set because I had to get the kids home, but just managed to make it back in time for the amazing Michael Berk (http://www.michaelberk.com)
The guy is an absolute genius on the guitar and really is a joy to watch.
I've seen him play four times now and he just gets better every time I see him :D

After starting on the beers during Michael Berks set i was quite tuned in by the time we were the last to leave at about 2am !!!!
Another superb day - I'm getting worried because every day is fantastic at the moment and it's bound to come to an end soon.
Or then again maybe it will last forever.......

Hmmmmm, got quite a day lined up today.
A guy we know has organised a music festival in his back garden while his parents are away... now I know you think that it can't be a proper thing but there's six or seven bands playing so I hope he's let the neighbours know !!!!

Going picking my kids up from their house at twelve so once we've had dinner its off to Kenfest !!!!

Should be fun.

I had a call today from a mate who's had a hard time recently.
He just thanked me for being there for him which really meant alot to me.

We've known each other for years but I've not seen him for over 8 years as he lives away now....

we caught up this week though and it really meant alot to me that I could have been in some way helpful to him, especially considering that my head's up my ass already !!!!

I have just experienced what can only be described as the best, most fun day of my entire life.....

I have spent the entire day with the girl who I am so totally in love with and we've had just about as much fun as it's possible to have.

It's such a shame that she won't let go and love me back but we have so much fun i don't even mind about that.

It's right to say that I doubt I have ever had such a good day in my entire life (except for the birth of my kids)

I love you babe xxxx ( not that she ever reads this lol)

I've had a bad couple of days feelings wise but the best couple of days in terms of finding out that people actually like me and care about me alot.

Tuesday probably wasn't a good idea to start drinking at 1pm but I managed to stay in the pub for over 12hrs anyway..... don't remember much after tea time but I wasn't badly behaved, I just talked alot apparently ( too much !!). 

There's people who I care about but I didn't realise anyone really liked me... after all I am a huge pain in the ass.

Last night I went out again and a good friend made sure I was looked after.
There were others too, it's unbelieveable.
Anyway I cheered up considerably once my best friend got there, I don't know how I could live without her.... she's truly wonderful x

You're a SAUCEPOT 
You might think your sex appeal peaks and dips depending on your mood - in fact, you're pretty irresistible any day. It's the fact that you're so uncontrived that makes men notice you. Some nights you might glam yourself up, other times you go as you are. Oddly enough, it's the times when you don't make an effort that you're at your most alluring. Men treat you as an equal and know they can have a laugh with you - then, just as they've got you labelled as a mate, they realise they're falling hook, line and sinker. 

Boost your sex appeal by: enhancing your good points. Using your excellent flirting skills - you're playful and teasing rather than off-putting. Just be yourself. 

If only this were true..........

Well what to do with myself today?????

I'm going out tonite but I'm not sure what I should do with the largest part of the day.
I've got a doctors appointment for tomorrow so hopefully I don't have to go back to work for at least a week....

Maybe I'll go and look at some cars and try and find myself a new one. I really miss having a car, I never missed it when I couldn't drive but now I feel so trapped and unable to do things I want - it's weird.

I've been chatting on messenger since 7am and the person I was talking to has said a great many really nice things to me and for that I sincerely thank her.

So many people have been really good to me recently and it's strange for me as i was doing a good job of being a loner but I've realised that all the time I was making alot of really close friends but I just couldn't see it.

So, to all the people who've been helping me with my fragile mind recently a huge THANKYOU x

Well, I was so stressed with work again today that at one point I actually vomited.
I need a break...
Lynsey you rock my world too :D

So in complete contrast to the absolutely shit week at work comes the absolutely amazing thing that happened to me out of work :


I met a girl 
She rocks
My world

xxxxxxxxxxx

I shall leave it at that :P

Well, my week could not be any more extreme if I attempted to make it that way......

I'll start with the really crappy bit thats stressing me out and driving me to the brink of nervous breakdown :

Work has been an absolute nightmare this week, I don't even remember if I've already posted this but writing on here helps me to sort things out in my head a little so here goes.

Monday - complete schizophrenic lunatic goes beserk at me and being the manager of a store I had to stand there and take it. Fucking lunatic, she's lucky she never got chinned the way she spoke to me (although obviously I would never do that but thats how I felt :( )
By Wednesday, I was firmly back in the bad books with the area manager who only two days previous had told me I was fantastic - he's as schizo as the woman on Monday.
Anyway - I tried to explain that the reason I feel that I can't get my head back into work was that I've been having a hard time since nearly dying the other week.....
His reply "well I'm not having it, thats no excuse, sort yourself out man and get your head back into it"

FUCKING PRICK.

Anyway today has also been another nightmare as the controller fpr all the tills went down and I've been totally stressed to fucking high heaven.

Its fixed now but I hate my job so badly I'm gonna quit if it gets any worse as I thought my head was going to explode today.
Wonder if I have a case for constructive dismissal against him if I say how stressed I was and he said that and put pressure on me so I felt I had to quit.......
HMMMMMMMMM ??

How appropriate - I would like this really to be my final words on this earth.. It's amusing me just to think that it could be :D
What will your last words be? by cum_on_bitch

I realise that I've not written about anything else this week but the truth is I've not thought about anything else !!!!!

I'm totally blown away by how I feel about her, it's really unlike me.
Normally I keep a long distance between myself and others but this time I've just felt so easy in her company that I've really let her see the real me.

I hope this works out.

Power Rangers Movie!

What movie Do you Belong in?(many different outcomes!)
brought to you by Quizilla

Well, I'm not sure how but I've only gone and fallen in love !!

The girl just totally blows my mind and I enjoy being with her so much....
I couldn't really stop myself from feeling this way.

Of course, there's a problem with this - she doesn't want a relationship but on the up side she feels the same about me (I think)

She's just so fantastic that it makes me smile even when we're not together.
If only she hadn't had such a bad time recently, I don't think she'd be trying so hard to keep me at arms length then.

Ah well...... what we have at the moment is making me happy so I'm not going to push my luck.
Hopefully I'll see her later, I hope so because I miss her when we're apart.......

So another day of bed and internet.... only four hours sleep last night.
I'm really restless at the moment.
Listened to The Misfits all afternoon and carried out some more flirting ;)

I'm good at flirting I think but I need practice !!

Scared of practicing though..... that means I might have to have a relationship and actually let someone in.... scary or what?

Instead I just stay in my room again (although when i walk I still fell dizzy so that's why i stay here)

If this is a "light concussion" I'd hate to have a proper one.
And how do you get a proper one if a motorbike hitting you at 70mph doesn't give you one ?? I dread to think.....

At least i haven't thrown up today and there were no bad dreams last night.
And I actually managed some food even if it has made me feel a bit funny - at least I've eaten.
Think I'll go out tonight - might even get drunk although that may not be a great idea, but I'll try it and find out anyway !!

Just how good are The Misfits ??
two full days of them now and I'm still punking it up !!!!!
They rawk !

Good night out tonight.

Had fun and I'm in a good mood again.

You should be dating a Libra. 23 September - 22 October This mate is artistic, refined, loving and
romantic. Though the balance of Libra can
display manipulative, overbearing and indolent
traits, this mate is sure to be a passionate
addition to your bed.

What Zodiac Sign Are You Attracted To?
brought to you by Quizilla I've been having crazy nightmares so this is what I'm doing instead of sleeping !
Hmmm..... Looks as bad as it felt. Many thanks to Lynsey for showing me how to hook pics up :D

My brain is really hurting !!

I keep forgetting everything, I've just locked the back door then walked out of the room and told my brother to lock the back door....

If this doesn't end I think I could be classed as insane - the doctors diagnosis of "you need some paracetamol" doesn't seem very accurate to me
